column5: I just bought a couple of ATV's and and I am looking for some trail maps if anyone could send me a link.  Also if you know of some fun to get to lakes in the Bancroft area that you are willing to share that would be great
I usually look up the OFSC trail maps online.  But once the season is over, they take the maps down.
Check out walmart.....they sell a backroads mapbook which shows atv trails, backroads, back lakes....etc. I think it's about $30.
Go to www.kawarthaatv.com they have all sorts of trail maps and links. They also offer guided rides which would be a super way to introduce you to the trail system in this area.

There are trails every were north of Bancroft I ride out of Barry's bay.Have been riding up there four six years now.Just make sure you have a gps it is easy to get lost. Here is the stocking list for the area You can get to most of these lake by ATV http://www.ontariostewardship.org/councils/bancroft/files/Stocking_List_2007_2010_final.pdf  Ride with care and be safe.
